name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Robert Jay VEDATSKY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Vedatsky

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Robert Jay VEDATSKY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of December, 1996, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated October 31,1996, it is hereby
ORDERED that ROBERT JAY VEDATSKY, be and he is SUSPENDED from the Bar of this Commonwealth for a period of two (2) years, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217 Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
688 A.2d 689
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Robert Jay VEDATSKY, Respondent.
No. 281, Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 30, 1996.
